values.description:
Obicon Group partner with clients to build-out both teams and individual recruitment solutions across any International location

We have an established network within the Oracle community and have multiple recruitment solutions that include Retained Campaigns, RPO and Executive Search & Selection

We meet our clients recruitment needs while simultaneously branding them as the employer of choice within the candidate community

Offices: London, Brighton, India, Australia, USA
values.name: Obicon Group

values.description:
MTM Property is a market leader for Sales & Lettings in Brighton & Hove. With the largest rental portfolio and an ever expanding sales department, you can be confident in instructing us to sell or let your property.  

We work hard to match tenants and buyers to properties with a degree of tenacity that is hard to match. We are very experienced and have gained thorough knowledge through years of buying, selling and letting our own property. Our range of services is comprehensive, can be tailored to meet your needs and our rates are competitive so call us to find out why 100% of respondents in a recent survey would recommend MTM to friends and family.

Over the last couple of years our sales department has developed and expanded to accommodate a diverse range of properties, buyers and sellers. Our growth is underpinned and driven by our sheer determination to provide you, the customer, with an unrivalled personal and detailed service. We take the time to listen to you, understand your requirements and then tailor our package to meet your specific needs.

In many cases we have succeeded in agreeing sales on properties marketed by other larger agents in the area. Even in what is undeniably a challenging market, our focus on matching serious buyers to the right property has paid off, with many sellers pleasantly surprised at our ability to source a buyer for their property where others failed.
values.name: MTM Property Services Ltd

values.description:
Midtown Studios is an affordable Audio Production & Recording Studio based in Sutton, South London. Specializing in recording,  editing, mixing & mastering audio for all media platforms. The studio complex is built within the premises of Sutton Music Centre, boasting three fully isolated sound proof studio rooms and an excellent range of pro audio equipment and music production software.

Set up in early 2011, by Tom Hand & Alex Williams, two BA(Hons) Music Production Graduates from the University of Brighton, who between them have an extensive knowledge of modern record  production and audio manipulation techniques.

So no matter if a full Length commercial music album, one track demo or even a voice over, Midtown Studios has the equipment and the knowhow to bring out the best in any production.
values.name: Midtown Studios

values.description:
Professional advisers on commercial property across South East England with offices in both Horsham & Brighton.

The practice of Crickmay, Chartered Surveyors, was established in 1984 with Crickmay Asset Management being established in 2002. The offices are strategically placed, allowing the practice to cover both East and West Sussex and the South East. Our range of knowledge within these offices allows us to provide a wide spectrum of advice on property matters.

The Client base of the firm is broad, acting on behalf of Public Companies, Statutory Bodies and many of the major Banks, together with multiple and local retailers, office occupiers, industrialists, developers and private individuals, dealing with a whole range of matters, from the smallest property to a multi-million pound development.
values.name: Crickmay Chartered Surveyors

values.description:
Since 2002, video2brain has been working with leading instructors to build a world-class video training library. We produce English, German, French, and Spanish-language courses on a wide variety of topics, including web design, video production, photography, web and mobile development, 3D graphics, and much more. The English-language team has been creating courses since 2009 and our library now has 190 English-language titles with over 722 hours of training!

We're an international crew, spread out over the globe, from San Francisco and San Jose, to Austin and New York, to Brighton and London, and back over to Vienna and our home office in Graz, Austria, a student city in the Austrian Alps.  

We're passionate about teaching and our chief aim is to help you create extraordinary work by providing you with the most engaging, effective, and affordable video training possible.
values.name: video2brain

values.description:
International Health and Wellbeing Distribution Company.

Based in UK with offices in Colchester and Brighton.

Incorporated in October 2010.

Co-founders Mr Darren Alger and Mr Barry Wright.

Over 30 years of combined experience in the commercial and professional footcare markets.

Portfolio of brands include:

high heel mate® with Insolia® High Heel Inserts
Vasyli™ Medical Orthotics and Footwear
Vionic™ Retail Orthotics and Footwear
Bootmate® Pressure Protection Socks

We are a distribution business covering the EMEA region.

Contact us by email: info@diastemalimited.com for further information about distribution opportunities across the EMEA region.

Specialties:
One director is a former Podiatrist with over 10 years clinical practice, the other has a wealth of foot care and logistics knowledge to offer.
We are entrepreneurial by culture and instinct. 
We pride ourselves on being business relationship specialists -  we continue to build long term business relationships that are mutually beneficial.
Diastema Limited is sales and results focused, combined with a conviction that in our sector we can make a difference to people's health and wellbeing, and be successful in business.

values: Health and Wellbeing brand development company
Excellent logistics and product support for our partners
Offering both retail and medical expertise

values.description:
Anthony Hunt Photography is a Brighton and London based commercial photography and press photography agency - providing professional photography for commercial briefs across Sussex, Surrey and London.

With over 10 years of experience, AHP looks to provide our clients with creative and dynamic photography in a flexible and affordable way

Producers, performers and promoters, most notably of the international
touring show, Faulty Towers The Dining Experience.

Touring over 20 countries in 2013 and with a permanent London West End
residency too, this critically acclaimed show has been winning five-star reviews and
standing ovations since 1997. It’s ‘a two-hour eat, drink and laugh sensation’ (Daily
Telegraph).

The fun starts as the audience wait to be seated and then hurtles along as they
become diners in that infamous hotel. Meanwhile, Basil, Sybil and Manuel aspire
to be their warring waiters, serving a 3-course meal with a good dollop of mayhem.
This is fully immersive, highly improvised, site-specific comedy theatre at its best –
and because only a third of show is scripted, performances are always fresh. Expect
all the best gags and ‘a rip-roaringly hilarious night out’ (This Is London). Just don't
mention the war!

- ‘utterly delicious entertainment’ (Edinburgh Evening News, Edinburgh Fringe)
- ‘the best comedy show I have ever been to’ (Sunday Express, Edinburgh Fringe)
- ‘faultless’ (What’s on Stage, Brighton Fringe)
- ‘amazing talents!’ (Australian Stage, Melbourne International Comedy Festival)
- ‘There’s a reason this show constantly gets rave reviews. It’s brilliant!’ (Adelaide
Now headline, Adelaide Fringe 2013)

Specialities

Immersive theatre, tour planning and management, improvisation, PR and arts
marketing.
values.name: Interactive Theatre International
Fifty Zero Design Agency

values: Design for Large Print - Banners / Billboards etc

values.description:
Fifty Zero Design Agency is part of Fifty Zero Ltd - a UK registered company founded by British online marketeer Richard Christopher Hills. Richard is the Creative Director and Project Manager of the agency who currently lives in the digital hub of Brighton, UK, previously being based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia for 18 months.  

The agency often teams up with top designers, coders and creative I.T. professionals from around the world - predominantly from the UK, Singapore and Pakistan. We are always looking for new and exciting projects to work on and can cater for all budgets and ambitions.

We approach design from a business based perspective, where creative decisions are made with the goals of the companies / organisations / individuals we work with firmly in mind. Quality design is only possible after careful research and analysis of your companies position in the market and the vision you have for the future. We work in partnership with you to turn your creative visions into realities.

Kraft Renewable Energy is committed to helping you save and make your own energy.

We provide a full PV Solar Panel Insulation Service. We start with a free detailed solar suitability survey of your home and promise an honest, straightforward view of your solar potential. We use MCS accredited solar installers and only recommend the best quality solar panels. We pride ourselves on our solar after-care service.

We also now provide a complete Air Source Heat Pump service, from advice on government incentives and savings to installation and aftercare.

In addition we can conduct home energy surveys which come with an Energy Performance Certificate (EPC) for your home. We can install a range of energy saving products, from insulation to energy efficiency monitors.

If you live in Brighton or Sussex, why not come in for a chat at our Renewable Energy showroom? We can show you our own solar installation and we also have an eco play house for the kids! 

Alternatively please call us on our free phone number 0800 298 0259 or email us at info@kraftrenewableenergy.com.
values.name: Kraft Renewable Energy

values.description:
S A Prestige Events specialise in luxury and bespoke events across London, Brighton, South and South East. We have a lovely team of ladies here to tailor your event to your specific requirements making it memorable, unique and special. We have years of events and marketing experience and we guarantee a professional and flawless service.

We've held parties for over 1000+ guests and brought that extra bit of sparkle to each party. We are able to cater for whatever your heart desires, from the most extravagant, avant-garde parties to something more small, intimate and private. We can ensure you an unforgettable party your friends and family will be talking about for months after...

values: Live+virtual events to animate key messages

values.description:
We help companies bring their strategy to life internally and externally through events and ongoing consultancy. 

Our programmes are immersive, authentic and engaging, to help cultivate a sustained enthusiasm for expressing company, team and personal vision and values.

Our background is a mix of 25 years of blue chip consulting in customer experience, culture change and personal effectiveness, large group corporate communications, coupled with a 7 year track record of 5-star press acclaimed and award winning international theatre productions.

This mix of abilities provides a unique style and facilitates engagement with our tools and methods.

We are co-authors of the book 'Brand Alchemy' (2007, Blackhall Publishing).

360 Degree Vision is a trading name of Visions Training & Development Ltd Ref:2241851; Registered Offices: Maria House, 35 Miller's Road, Brighton, BN1 5NP
